00186 
00187   typedef hash_map<int, const char *>  TextMap;
00188 
00189   TextMap &build_text_map() {
00190     TextMap *map = new TextMap();
00191     for (int i=0; error_info[i].text != 0; i++)
00192       (*map)[error_info[i].code] = error_info[i].text;
00193     return *map;
00194   }
00195 
00196   TextMap &text_map = build_text_map();
00197 
00198 } // local namespace
00199 
00200 const char *Error::get_text(int error) {
00201   const char *text = text_map[error];
00202   if (text == 0)
00203     return "ERROR NOT REGISTERED";
00204   return text;
00205 }
00206 
00207 namespace Hypertable {
00208 
00209 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const Exception &e) {
00210   out <<"Hypertable::Exception: "<< e.message() <<" - "
00211       << Error::get_text(e.code());
00212 
00213   if (e.line())
00214     out <<"\n\tat "<< e.func() <<" ("<< e.file() <<':'<< e.line() <<')';
00215 
00216   int prev_code = e.code();
00217 
00218   for (Exception *prev = e.prev; prev; prev = prev->prev) {
00219     out <<"\n\tat "<< (prev->func() ? prev->func() : "-") <<" ("
00220         << (prev->file() ? prev->file() : "-") <<':'<< prev->line() <<"): "
00221         << prev->message();
00222 
00223     if (prev->code() != prev_code) {
00224       out <<" - "<< Error::get_text(prev->code());
00225       prev_code = prev->code();
00226     }
00227   }
00228   return out;
00229 }
00230 
00231 std::ostream &
00232 Exception::render_messages(std::ostream &out, const char *sep) const {
00233   out << message() <<" - "<< Error::get_text(m_error);
00234 
00235   for (Exception *p = prev; p; p = p->prev)
00236     out << sep << p->message();
00237 
00238   return out;
00239 }
